title: CryptoYar
author: CryptoYar
content: What happened: MyUniverse Plagiarized WhitepaperWebsite: https://myuniverse.online -(Archived)Whitepaper: https://myuniverse.online/whitepaper.pdfICO status:  Live https://presale.myuniverse.online/QuoteDates    247 days oldCreated on 2021-11-03Expires on 2022-11-03Updated on 2022-04-11copied from [1] [2]1) https://www.amknews.com/what-is-metaverse-how-to-get-it-popular-metaverse-coin-projects/2) https://stageten.tv/blog/what-does-being-a-creator-mean-in-2020

comments.author: ScamViruS
comments.body: Still crypto projects are coming to the market to fool crypto investors by copying the content of other projects. But sadly, these fake projects are very successful in their mission, because there are many inexperienced crypto investors who invest in such projects in the hope of making a quick profit without any research. New crypto users should do minimum research before investing in any project. This will save them from major losses.
